EmailTemplate.name: 201808_Global_Email_JetWave_WebCast_TM.201809_Global_ThankYou_JetWave_WebCast_mi
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending Our Webcast - Experience the High-Speed Wi-Fi Advantage: Jet ConneX Powered by JetWave™
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> THANK YOU FOR ATTENDING! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for attending our webcast - Experience the High-Speed Wi-Fi Advantage: Jet ConneX Powered by JetWave™.
The presentation slides <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/JetWave_101_r5_FINAL.pdf]]> and the recording <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/recording/play/mj-ofAgGAVnw6CAJjP82KZRFKA_psqqzOLcVjGQ8P3aMSt6Tm09BInZxtJb-qEZD?startTime=1536678097000]]> of the webcast is ready for you to review and share with your colleagues.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about the next webinars, events, product launches and more!
YES, KEEP ME IN THE LOOP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We look forward to seeing you again.
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace
